title: What is the role of magnetism in maintaining health? - A discussion of Mesmer's belief in the interaction and correlation between beings and the flow of magnetic currents through the nervous system. It is found that a properly functioning brain is crucial for the correct flow of magnetism in the body, which can be disrupted by even small disturbances in health. Proper clothing, diet, and behavior are emphasized for effective magnetization to occur. The text covers techniques for inducing deep sleep in patients, recognizing and treating various spasms and inflammations, and developing the magnetism of the magnétiseur through prayer and fasting. Various methods of magnétisation are discussed, including working with specific organs and muscle groups, as well as using passes to strengthen the subject's overall energy.
first_phrase: The following text delves into the world of magnetism, exploring its various definitions and applications. Initially defined by Keppler and Paracelse as the fundamental force that holds the universe together and drives all natural processes, magnetism later took on a more specific meaning through the work of Mesmer, who described it as the interaction and correlation between beings, particularly in regards to nerve currents in the body. The text also discusses the role of magnetism in maintaining good physical health, and how this can be achieved through proper brain function and a conscious mind-body connection. The latter half of the text provides practical advice for magnetism practitioners, including tips for how to dress a subject for magnetism treatment, how to induce somnambulism, and how to recognize and alleviate spasms that may occur during treatment. Overall, the text provides a comprehensive overview of magnetism and its uses in promoting physical and spiritual well-being.
content: Mais la personne qui montre meme dans un mot la plus petite reaction hypocondryaque ou hysterique, ou qui fait un mouvenment bloqué ou excessif, ou qui en dessus ou en dessous de son poids est malade, ou au moins elle à le germe de la maladie en soi - mais alors personne peut etre complétement saine Personne est complétement saine, mais ça ne signifie pas que personne puisse dévenir plus saine. - de quoi a-t-on besoin pour une bonne courante de magnètisme? Le bon écoulement du magnètisme dépend d'une efficace fonctionnement du cerveau. - doit on alors travailler surtout sur le cerveau? Non. Parce que quand on travaille sur a partie qui souffre, ou encore mieux dit, sur le plexus qui travaille mal, on travaille eo ipso sur le cerveau, parce à partir de là avec le mouvement, et vers là à travers les impression circule la courante, ainsi comme le sang du coeur au coeur - ou se montre-t-elle cette courante? surement dans le cerveau, et sans doute dans les différents organes spécfiques, comme il est aussi appris dans la phrénologie - qu'est qu'il se passe avec la courante conduite Elle pose une part de son moi, de la meme façon que le sang dans les glandes, directement dans le sang; ça signifie que le sang n'est jamais le meme. Après me pouls et le battement cardiaque peut changer, comme si une matière étrange était entré dedans. Et on voit ce changement dans les mots et pensées - est-ce que le comportement excité est comparable au comportement de l'inflammation? Surement.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the concept of magnetism and its therapeutic benefits is based on the idea that our bodies generate energy which can be influenced by magnetic fields. It is essential to maintain a good flow of magnetism in our bodies as it depends on the proper functioning of our brain. Any imbalance or illness, even the slightest reactions or movement in excess, can affect this flow. Therefore, to become healthier, we must work on strengthening our bodies through effective magnetic therapy, which can lead to improved physical and mental health.
